Property.Name: Body
Property.Value: <FlowDocument xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:osiann="clr-namespace:OSIsoft.AN.Notification;assembly=OSIsoft.AF.Notification.DeliveryChannel.Email" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Section><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Event: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="9cfcde7e-9975-4aca-a6ba-47dc17119902" ContentProperty="0" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Name: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="418df2db-58ed-4c27-97de-0a909bd8b2fe" ContentProperty="0" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Server: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="888f1705-c21e-49cb-8941-89ecc83ef8c1" ContentProperty="0" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Database: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="a5407735-c1da-4659-8b46-0c82a2450d30" ContentProperty="0" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Start Time: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="9cfcde7e-9975-4aca-a6ba-47dc17119902" ContentProperty="2001" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Target: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="67fad554-031e-4e5f-9798-7ebccb4e909e" ContentProperty="1000" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Severity: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="9cfcde7e-9975-4aca-a6ba-47dc17119902" ContentProperty="2004" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph><Bold xml:space="preserve">Send Time: </Bold><osiann:ANInlineContent ContentID="418df2db-58ed-4c27-97de-0a909bd8b2fe" ContentProperty="2003" PersistedContentName="" AdditionalData="" /></Paragraph><Paragraph /></Section></FlowDocument>

AFDatabase.Name: AF Example Kit - Pump Condition Based Maintenance (RDX)
AFDatabase.Description: Condition Based Maintenance for Pumps with Asset Based PI

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Bearing Temperature
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Average (Daily)
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%..|Attribute%.%Attribute%;TimeRangeMethod=Average;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Calculated Efficiency
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Current Draw
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Discharge Flow Rate
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Maximum (Hourly)
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%..|Attribute%.%Attribute%;TimeRangeMethod=Average;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: SP
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Controller Setpoint (would usually be a control system tag rather than calculation)

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Horsepower
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT [Horsepower (BHP)] FROM [OSIDemo_Pump Manufacturer Information] WHERE Manufacturer = @Manufacturer

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Installation Date
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT [Installation Date] FROM [OSIDemo_CMMS Data (Maintenance Information)] WHERE [Serial Number] = '%Element%'

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Pump Status
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Int16;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%;step=1

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Pump Type
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT Type FROM [OSIDemo_Pump Manufacturer Information] WHERE Manufacturer = @Manufacturer

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Serial Number
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT [Product Name] FROM [OSIDemo_Pump Manufacturer Information] WHERE Manufacturer = @Manufacturer

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Suction Pressure
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Float32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%

AFTimeRule.ConfigString: Day=Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat

AFAnalysisRule.ConfigString: Status := IF '{09e76e19-cc23-4462-8e42-317cbb4e37ad};Current Draw' > 1 AND '{2acc6453-5c53-40a8-a10e-d5b0d2582948};Pump Status' = "OFF" THEN "ON" ELSE IF '{09e76e19-cc23-4462-8e42-317cbb4e37ad};Current Draw' < 1 AND '{2acc6453-5c53-40a8-a10e-d5b0d2582948};Pump Status' = "ON" THEN "OFF" ELSE IF '{09e76e19-cc23-4462-8e42-317cbb4e37ad};Current Draw' > 1 AND '{2acc6453-5c53-40a8-a10e-d5b0d2582948};Pump Status' = "ON" THEN NoOutput() ELSE IF '{09e76e19-cc23-4462-8e42-317cbb4e37ad};Current Draw' < 1 AND '{2acc6453-5c53-40a8-a10e-d5b0d2582948};Pump Status' = "OFF" THEN NoOutput() ELSE IF TagBad('{2acc6453-5c53-40a8-a10e-d5b0d2582948};Pump Status','*') THEN "OFF" ELSE NoOutput();

AFAnalysisRule.VariableMapping: LastMaintRuntime||RunHours Since Maintenance;[GUID]||{fc0db3a7-af09-4f42-b996-52ecc91f9645};InstallationRuntime||RunHours Since Installation;[GUID]||{f37bdf78-f504-44dc-b2ea-acdc977e6b4f};NumberofStarts||Number of Starts Since Maintenance;[GUID]||{efa38822-b3eb-47a7-8783-ce9135009b29};[GUID]||[UNSET];

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Number of Pumps On
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: \\%@\Config|Data Archive Name%\%Database%.%Element%.%Attribute%;pointtype=Int32;datasecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Data Security String%;pointsource=%@\Config|Analysis Point Source%;ptsecurity=%@\Config|Analysis Point Security String%
